ground_truth: She turns to face the camera and undoes the ties on her dressing gown. She takes a deep breath and drops the gown to the floor. She does a big, cheesy grin as the camera takes a picture, then frowns and shakes her head. She sets up the camera again and tries a variety of poses, attempting to be sexy. She rips a cute kitten poster off the wall. She prints out one of the photos, puts it in an envelope, and writes Cal’s name on the envelope. She stops decorating the envelope. She opens the front door to find a bunch of lilies. Jessica picks up the bunch of flowers and reads the note. She shakes her head and stares out into the night. Cal is doing guerrilla gardening again. Cal puts the tools back in the shed. From in the house, Cal turns towards the house. He watches as Molly and Robbie hurry to the table. Emily traipses through the house to another room. She picks up a phone and dials. In the garden, Cal takes his phone out. Cal eyes Emily nervously. Cal watches Emily, who is not in the basement at all. Emily smiles. Cal's eyes are full of tenderness. Emily hangs up and looks down sadly. Cal hangs up, still watching her from the garden. Emily heads back to the kids. The wheels of a trolley rotate on a shiny floor. Cal is in a DIY store with Robbie and Molly. Cal picks up a wooden trellis. Jacob is in a wine shop. Jacob turns to Hannah. He pinches her nose, then kisses her. They head off. In Jessica's bedroom, her mom, Claire, is putting away clean laundry. As she puts something in her drawer, she spots the envelope. She takes it out to see Cal's name written on it in big letters. She opens the envelope and partially pulls out the photo from inside. She gasps, horrified. Emily drives her SUV along her leafy, suburban street and turns into her driveway. Robbie is standing in the front garden. Her brow furrowed, Emily stares at him. He waves. Her brow furrowed, Emily stares at him. Claire comes down the stairs in a state of shock. Bernie is sitting on the couch, watching TV. Bernie takes a swig of Coca-Cola. Claire grabs Bernie's shoulder from behind the couch and hands him the envelope. Bernie gives Claire a little frown and turns back to the TV. Absentmindedly, he opens the envelope and glances down at the photo. He freezes. There are several photos in there. He goes through them. His jaw goes slack. Jessica, who is lying on the floor nearby, spots the envelope. Bernie races her from the couch to the door.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: She rotates to confront the camera and loosens the cords on her robe. She inhales deeply and lets the robe fall to the ground. She gives a large, goofy smile as the camera captures an image, then scowls and shakes her head. She arranges the camera anew and attempts a range of stances, striving to be alluring. She tears a charming kitten poster from the wall. She produces one of the images, places it in an envelope, and writes Cal's name on the envelope. She ceases embellishing the envelope. She opens the front door to discover a cluster of lilies. Jessica picks up the bouquet and reads the note. She shakes her head and gazes out into the evening. Cal is engaging in guerrilla gardening again. Cal places the equipment back in the shed. From inside the dwelling, Cal turns toward the house. He observes as Molly and Robbie rush to the table. Emily strides through the house to another room. She picks up a phone and dials. In the garden, Cal extracts his phone. Cal regards Emily apprehensively. Cal observes Emily, who is not in the basement at all. Emily beams. Cal's eyes are full of affection. Emily hangs up and gazes downward sorrowfully. Cal disconnects, still watching her from the garden. Emily returns to the children. The wheels of a cart revolve on a polished floor. Cal is in a home improvement store with Robbie and Molly. Cal picks up a wooden lattice. Jacob is in a liquor shop. Jacob turns to Hannah. He pinches her nose, then kisses her. They depart. In Jessica's bedroom, her mom, Claire, is putting away clean clothes. As she places something in her drawer, she notices the envelope. She removes it to see Cal's name inscribed on it in large letters. She opens the envelope and partially pulls out the image from within. She gasps, aghast. Emily drives her SUV along her leafy, suburban street and turns into her driveway. Robbie is standing in the front garden. Her brow creased, Emily stares at him. He waves. Her brow creased, Emily stares at him. Claire descends the stairs in a state of shock. Bernie is sitting on the couch, watching TV. Bernie takes a sip of Coca-Cola. Claire grabs Bernie's shoulder from behind the couch and hands him the envelope. Bernie gives Claire a slight frown and turns back to the TV. Distractedly, he opens the envelope and glances down at the photo. He freezes. There are several images in there. He goes through them. His jaw becomes slack. Jessica, who is lying on the floor nearby, notices the envelope. Bernie races her from the couch to the door.

test_cases.name: Active <-> Passive Transformation
test_cases.description: She turns to face the camera and the ties on her dressing gown are undone by her. A deep breath is taken by her and the gown is dropped to the floor. A big, cheesy grin is done by her as a picture is taken by the camera, then she frowns and her head is shaken. The camera is set up by her again and a variety of poses are tried by her in an attempt to be sexy. A cute kitten poster is ripped off the wall by her. One of the photos is printed out by her, it is put in an envelope, and Cal’s name is written on the envelope by her. Decorating the envelope is stopped by her. The front door is opened by her to find a bunch of lilies. The bunch of flowers is picked up by Jessica and the note is read by her. Her head is shaken and she stares out into the night. Guerrilla gardening is being done by Cal again. The tools are put back in the shed by Cal. From in the house, Cal turns towards the house. Molly and Robbie are hurried to the table by him as he watches. Emily traipses through the house to another room. A phone is picked up and dialed by her. In the garden, the phone is taken out by Cal. Emily is eyed nervously by Cal. Emily is watched by Cal, who is not in the basement at all. Emily smiles. Cal's eyes are filled with tenderness. The call is hung up by Emily and she looks down sadly. Cal hangs up, still watching her from the garden. The kids are headed back to by Emily. The wheels of a trolley rotate on a shiny floor. In a DIY store, a wooden trellis is picked up by Cal with Robbie and Molly. In a wine shop, Jacob turns to Hannah. Her nose is pinched by him, then she is kissed by him. They head off. In Jessica's bedroom, clean laundry is being put away by her mom, Claire. As something is put in her drawer, the envelope is spotted by her. It is taken out by her to see Cal's name written on it in big letters. The envelope is opened by her and the photo from inside is partially pulled out. She gasps, horrified. Her SUV is driven by Emily along her leafy, suburban street and the driveway is turned into by her. In the front garden, Robbie is standing. Her brow furrowed, he is stared at by Emily. He waves. Her brow furrowed, he is stared at by Emily. Claire comes down the stairs in a state of shock. On the couch, TV is being watched by Bernie. A swig of Coca-Cola is taken by Bernie. Bernie's shoulder is grabbed by Claire from behind the couch and the envelope is handed to him by her. Claire is given a little frown by Bernie and he turns back to the TV. Absentmindedly, the envelope is opened by him and the photo is glanced down at by him. He freezes. There are several photos in there. They are gone through by him. His jaw goes slack. Jessica, who is lying on the floor nearby, spots the envelope. From the couch to the door, the race is led by Bernie.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: She faces the camera, unties her dressing gown, takes a deep breath, and drops it. With a cheesy grin, the camera captures a picture; then she frowns and resets the camera, trying sexy poses. She removes a kitten poster, prints a photo, places it in an envelope with Cal’s name, but stops decorating it. At the door, she finds lilies, reads the note, shakes her head, and stares into the night. Cal finishes guerrilla gardening and stores his tools. Inside, Cal sees Molly and Robbie rushing to the table as Emily heads to another room to use a phone. Cal, in the garden, watches Emily nervously. She smiles, hangs up, and returns to her kids. In a DIY store, Cal, Robbie, and Molly shop. Cal picks a trellis. Meanwhile, Jacob kisses Hannah in a wine shop. In Jessica's room, Claire finds an envelope for Cal, opens it, and is horrified by the photo inside. Emily drives home, spotting Robbie in the garden and frowns at him. Claire descends in shock. Bernie, on the couch, watches TV and drinks Coke. Claire hands Bernie the envelope, and as he views the photos, he freezes. Jessica, nearby, sees the envelope, and Bernie rushes to the door, racing her.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Facing the camera, she unties her dressing gown, drops it, grins, and then frowns. She resets the camera, tries sexy poses, and tears a kitten poster off the wall. She prints a photo, envelopes it for Cal, but stops decorating it. Answering the door, she finds lilies, reads the note, and shakes her head at Cal's gardening. Inside, Cal watches Molly and Robbie, while Emily dials a phone. Cal nervously watches Emily from the garden, full of tenderness. Emily and Cal hang up; she returns to the kids. In a DIY store with the kids, Cal picks up a trellis. Jacob, in a wine shop with Hannah, pinches her nose and kisses her. Jessica's mom, Claire, finds Cal's envelope in the drawer, opens it, and is horrified by the photo. Emily drives home, furrowed-browed, as Robbie waves. Claire shows Bernie the envelope; shocked, he examines the photos. Jessica tries to grab the envelope from Bernie, but he races her to the door.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: She slowly turns to face the camera, then carefully undoes the ties on her soft dressing gown, revealing her anticipation. Taking a deep, calming breath, she drops the gown gracefully to the floor, letting it pool around her feet. Flashing a big, cheesy grin filled with a mix of excitement and nervousness, she waits as the camera captures the moment. Afterwards, she frowns slightly, shaking her head in dissatisfaction. With determination, she sets up the camera once more, experimenting with a variety of poses as she attempts to strike a sexy pose. In a sudden change of mood, she tears a cute kitten poster from the wall, her mind set on something else. She proceeds to print out one of the photos that caught her eye, places it carefully into an envelope, and scrawls Cal’s name prominently across it. She then halts her decorating efforts. Opening the front door, she is greeted by the unexpected sight of a beautiful bunch of lilies. Jessica picks up the fragrant flowers and reads the attached note, shaking her head slowly as she gazes out into the night, lost in thought. Cal, engaged in his hobby of guerrilla gardening, finishes and puts the gardening tools back in the shed. Inside the house, Cal looks towards the home and watches as Molly and Robbie make their way quickly to the table. Meanwhile, Emily slowly makes her way through the house to another room. She picks up the phone and dials a number with purpose. In the garden, Cal retrieves his phone from his pocket, casting a nervous glance in Emily's direction. He observes Emily intently, although she is nowhere near the basement, but rather elsewhere. Emily smiles warmly, her expression one of gentle amusement. Cal's eyes reflect deep tenderness as he watches her. They both hang up, Emily looking down with a touch of sadness, while Cal continues to observe her from his spot in the garden. Emily returns to the children, her mind preoccupied. Elsewhere, the wheels of a trolley glide smoothly over the shiny floor, indicating Cal's presence in a busy DIY store with Robbie and Molly by his side. Cal lifts a sturdy wooden trellis, examining it carefully. In a separate scene, Jacob is at a wine shop. He turns towards Hannah, affectionately pinches her nose, and then kisses her softly. Together, they head off. Meanwhile, in the privacy of Jessica’s bedroom, her mom, Claire, is busy putting away freshly laundered clothes. As she places an item into a drawer, her eyes catch sight of an envelope. She takes it out, noticing Cal’s name written prominently across it in large letters. Curiosity piqued, she opens the envelope and begins to pull out the photo from inside. Her reaction is immediate as she gasps in horror. Meanwhile, Emily drives her SUV along her leafy and serene suburban street, eventually turning into her driveway. Robbie stands waiting in the front garden. Emily, her brow furrowed with concern, stares at him. Robbie waves back. With her brow still furrowed, Emily continues to focus on him. Inside the house, Claire descends the stairs, visibly shocked by her discovery. In the living room, Bernie is seated comfortably on the couch, absorbed in watching TV. He takes a casual swig of Coca-Cola, seemingly unaware of Claire’s distress. She approaches from behind the couch, grabs Bernie’s shoulder, and hands him the envelope. Bernie gives Claire a puzzled frown, briefly turning back to the TV. Without much thought, he opens the envelope and glances at the photo. Instantly, he freezes. The envelope holds several more photos, and as he sifts through them, his jaw slackens in disbelief. Lying on the floor nearby, Jessica spots the envelope, her interest piqued. Bernie, realizing the urgency, races Jessica from the couch to the door, the envelope in his grasp.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: She slowly and deliberately turns her body to face the camera, pausing for a moment before carefully undoing the ties on her soft, comfortable dressing gown, a gesture that reveals her palpable anticipation. Taking a deep, calming breath, she lets the gown fall gracefully to the floor, allowing it to pool gently around her feet. Flashing a big, cheesy grin that radiates a mix of excitement and nervousness, she stands still, waiting patiently as the camera captures the momentous occasion. Afterwards, she frowns slightly, a hint of dissatisfaction crossing her face as she shakes her head. With a look of determination, she sets up the camera once more, experimenting with a variety of poses in her eager attempts to strike a sexy pose. In a sudden and unexpected change of mood, she tears a cute kitten poster from the wall, her mind clearly set on something entirely different. She proceeds with care to print out one of the photos that caught her eye, placing it carefully into an envelope, and writes Cal’s name prominently across it in bold letters. Halting her decorating efforts, she opens the front door and is greeted by the unexpected sight of a beautiful, fragrant bunch of lilies. Jessica picks up the flowers, indulging in their sweet scent, and reads the attached note, her head shaking slowly as she gazes out into the night, deeply lost in thought. Meanwhile, Cal, deeply engrossed in his hobby of guerrilla gardening, finishes his task and puts the gardening tools back in the shed with care. Inside the house, Cal glances towards the home, watching attentively as Molly and Robbie make their way quickly to the table. Meanwhile, Emily moves slowly through the house towards another room. With purpose, she picks up the phone and dials a number. In the garden, Cal retrieves his phone from his pocket, casting a nervous glance in the direction of Emily. He observes Emily intently, noting that she is nowhere near the basement, but rather elsewhere. Emily smiles warmly, her expression one of gentle amusement. Cal’s eyes reflect deep tenderness as he watches her. They both hang up, Emily looking down with a touch of sadness, while Cal continues to observe her affectionately from his spot in the garden. Emily returns to the children, her mind clearly preoccupied with other thoughts. Elsewhere, the wheels of a trolley glide smoothly over the shiny floor, indicating Cal’s presence in a busy DIY store with Robbie and Molly by his side. Cal lifts a sturdy wooden trellis, examining it carefully and thoughtfully. In a separate scene, Jacob finds himself at a wine shop. He turns towards Hannah, affectionately pinches her nose, and then kisses her softly. Together, they head off with a sense of contentment. Meanwhile, in the privacy of Jessica’s bedroom, her mom, Claire, is occupied with putting away freshly laundered clothes. As she places an item into a drawer, her eyes catch sight of an envelope. She takes it out with curiosity, noticing Cal’s name written prominently across it in large letters. With her curiosity piqued, she opens the envelope and begins to pull out the photo inside. Her reaction is immediate as she gasps in horror at what she sees. Meanwhile, Emily drives her SUV along the leafy, serene, suburban street, eventually turning into her driveway where Robbie stands waiting in the front garden. Emily, her brow furrowed with concern, stares at him intently. Robbie waves back eagerly. With her brow still furrowed in thought, Emily continues to focus on him. Inside the house, Claire descends the stairs, visibly shocked and distressed by her discovery. In the living room, Bernie is seated comfortably on the couch, completely absorbed in watching TV. He takes a casual swig of Coca-Cola, seemingly unaware of Claire’s distress. She approaches from behind the couch, grabs Bernie’s shoulder, and hands him the envelope with urgency. Bernie gives Claire a puzzled frown, briefly turning back to the TV in confusion. Without much thought, he opens the envelope and glances at the photo. Instantly, he freezes in shock. The envelope holds several more photos, and as he sifts through them, his jaw slackens in disbelief. Lying on the floor nearby, Jessica spots the envelope, her interest piqued. Realizing the urgency of the situation, Bernie races Jessica from the couch to the door, the envelope clutched firmly in his grasp.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: She turns to face the camera, preparing herself, and with deliberate care begins to untie the knots of her dressing gown, her fingers working each tie loose. She pauses momentarily, taking a deep breath to steady her nerves, before letting the gown slip from her shoulders and fall in a pool around her feet. The click of the camera captures her broad, exaggerated grin, which shifts immediately to a frown as she shakes her head in dissatisfaction. Determined to get the right shot, she readjusts the camera and experiments with various poses, each one crafted to convey a sense of allure. In a moment of frustration, she yanks down a cute kitten poster from the wall, crumpling it into her hands. Having finally chosen a photo, she prints it out, slipping it into an envelope with practiced precision before scrawling "Cal" across its surface in bold letters. Yet, as she begins to embellish the envelope, her focus is drawn away. She walks to the front door, opening it to reveal a fresh bouquet of lilies awaiting her. She bends down, lifting the flowers to her nose while simultaneously reading the attached note. Her head shakes slowly as she gazes out into the night, pondering Cal's impromptu gardening escapade. Meanwhile, Cal methodically organizes his gardening tools, returning each one to its proper place in the shed. Within the house, Cal turns and observes as Molly and Robbie race eagerly towards the dining table. Emily meanders through the house and enters another room, picking up a telephone and dialing with deliberate intent. Out in the garden, Cal fishes his phone from his pocket, casting a watchful eye towards Emily, who stands not in the basement but elsewhere entirely. They exchange a look; her smile softens, and Cal's eyes brim with gentle emotion. As Emily ends the call, a shadow of sadness descends over her features. Cal, still in the garden, ends his call but continues to watch her with quiet longing. Emily, regaining her composure, returns to focus on the children. In a different setting, the wheels of a trolley hum across a shiny floor as Cal navigates a DIY store with Robbie and Molly, reaching for a wooden trellis with decisive intent. Elsewhere, Jacob stands in a wine shop, glancing over at Hannah. With playful affection, he pinches her nose before pulling her close for a kiss, and together they depart. Back in Jessica’s bedroom, her mom, Claire, busies herself putting laundry away. As she opens a drawer, her attention catches on the envelope with Cal's name emblazoned on it. Curiosity piqued, she extracts and partially slides the photo out, her reaction escalating to a gasp of horror. Meanwhile, Emily drives her SUV smoothly along the leafy, suburban streets before turning into her driveway, where Robbie stands in the garden. Her eyebrows knit in concern as she scrutinizes him intently. Robbie waves, repeating the gesture as her stare remains steady. Claire descends the stairs in shock, her mind racing. Bernie, absorbed in the television, takes a casual sip of Coca-Cola. Claire reaches him from behind the couch, laying the envelope in his hand. He offers Claire a puzzled look before redirecting his gaze to the TV. Distractedly, he opens the envelope, his eyes drifting down to the enclosed photo, where his expression shifts to surprise. He hesitates, finding a series of photos within, each one causing his jaw to drop further in disbelief. Jessica, sprawled on the floor nearby, immediately notices the envelope, prompting a frantic scramble as Bernie rushes from the couch, determined to beat her to the door.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: She faces the camera, loosens her dressing gown, and lets it fall to the floor, posing with a big grin for the picture. After frowning at the result, she adjusts the camera, experimenting with sexy poses and removing a kitten poster from the wall. She prints a photo, places it in an envelope labeled with Cal’s name, but stops decorating it when the doorbell rings. Finding lilies at the door, she reads the attached note, shaking her head as she looks out into the night, aware of Cal’s guerrilla gardening. Meanwhile, Cal tidies up his tools before watching from inside as Molly and Robbie rush to the table. Emily walks to another room, makes a phone call, and exchanges tender glances with Cal, who uneasily watches her from the garden. Emily hangs up and joins the kids again. Elsewhere, Cal is at a DIY store with Robbie and Molly, selecting a wooden trellis. In a wine shop, Jacob playfully pinches and kisses Hannah before they leave together. In Jessica’s bedroom, her mom Claire, while putting away laundry, finds the envelope with Cal’s name, opens it, and is shocked by the photo inside. Driving home, Emily sees Robbie in the garden and observes him thoughtfully. Claire, disturbed, shows the photos to Bernie, who is on the couch watching TV. He opens the envelope, scrutinizes the photos, and sits stunned as Jessica notices the envelope. Bernie and Jessica dash to the door in a hurried race.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: She turns to face the camera, a digital model known for its high resolution favored by amateur photographers, and undoes the ties on her dressing gown. She takes a deep breath and drops the gown to the floor, feeling the chill of the room. She does a big, cheesy grin as the camera takes a picture, capturing her uninhibited moment, then frowns and shakes her head. She sets up the camera again and tries a variety of poses, studying famous Instagram influencers, attempting to be sexy. She rips a cute kitten poster off the wall, a relic from her childhood room. She prints out one of the photos with her newly bought photo printer, puts it in an envelope, and writes Cal’s name on the envelope in looping letters that match the handwriting on previous letters. She stops decorating the envelope with heart stickers she then thought too childish. She opens the front door to find a bunch of lilies, flowers known for their elegant beauty. Jessica picks up the bunch of flowers, left by her front door on more than one occasion, and reads the note. She shakes her head, knowing who sent them and stares out into the night filled with the hum of cicadas. Cal is doing guerrilla gardening again, leaving plants in neglected urban spaces. Cal puts the tools back in the shed, a small wooden structure crammed with rusted equipment. From in the house, Cal turns towards the house, surveying his handiwork. He watches as Molly and Robbie hurry to the table, excited for their favorite dinner. Emily traipses through the house to another room, looking for some privacy. She picks up a phone and dials, reaching out to a friend who always gave good advice. In the garden, Cal takes his phone out, recognizing the call. Cal eyes Emily nervously, knowing the conversation is pivotal. Cal watches Emily, who is not in the basement at all but in the brightly lit kitchen. Emily smiles, grateful for his understanding. Cal's eyes are full of tenderness, knowing it’s a rare moment to see. Emily hangs up and looks down sadly, considering the weight of the decisions ahead. Cal hangs up, still watching her from the garden, as the wind rustles the leaves. Emily heads back to the kids, their laughter pulling her out of her thoughts. The wheels of a trolley rotate on a shiny floor in a large, bustling department store. Cal is in a DIY store with Robbie and Molly, a weekend ritual for household projects. Cal picks up a wooden trellis, envisioning the vine plants that will climb it. Jacob is in a wine shop, known for its extensive selection of reds. Jacob turns to Hannah, his longtime girlfriend who shares his love for Cabernet Sauvignon. He pinches her nose playfully, then kisses her. They head off, planning a cozy evening at home. In Jessica's bedroom, her mom, Claire, is putting away clean laundry with a mother's efficiency. As she puts something in her drawer, she spots the envelope on the dresser. She takes it out to see Cal's name written on it in big letters, recognizing the familiar handwriting. She opens the envelope and partially pulls out the photo from inside, her curiosity outweighing her hesitation. She gasps, horrified, at the unexpected nature of the images. Emily drives her SUV along her leafy, suburban street lined with identical houses and turns into her driveway. Robbie is standing in the front garden, partly obscured by the rose bushes. Her brow furrowed, Emily stares at him, wondering what mischief he's been up to. He waves, knowing his innocent smile often gets him out of trouble. Claire comes down the stairs in a state of shock, the photos still on her mind. Bernie is sitting on the couch, absorbed in a rerun of his favorite TV show. Bernie takes a swig of Coca-Cola, a habit he's had since college. Claire grabs Bernie's shoulder from behind the couch and hands him the envelope, urgency in her grip. Bernie gives Claire a little frown, puzzled by her reaction, and turns back to the TV. Absentmindedly, he opens the envelope and glances down at the photo, initially unaware of its significance. He freezes, realization dawning. There are several photos in there, each more shocking than the last. He goes through them, each one deepening his disbelief. His jaw goes slack, unable to comprehend what he's seeing. Jessica, who is lying on the floor nearby, spots the envelope, her name also scribbled on it. Bernie races her from the couch to the door, urgency in his step, to seek an explanation.

She gasps horrified. Emily drives her SUV along her leafy suburban street and turns into her driveway. Robbie is standing in the front garden. Her brow furrowed Emily stares at him. He waves. Her brow furrowed Emily stares at him. Claire comes down the stairs in a state of shock. Bernie is sitting on the couch watching TV. Bernie takes a swig of CocaCola. Claire grabs Bernie's shoulder from behind the couch and hands him the envelope. Bernie gives Claire a little frown and turns back to the TV. Absentmindedly he opens the envelope and glances down at the photo. He freezes. There are several photos in there. He goes through them. His jaw goes slack. Jessica who is lying on the floor nearby spots the envelope. Bernie races her from the couch to the door.

test_cases.name: Addition (~80%)
test_cases.description: She turns to face the camera and undoes the ties on her dressing gown. She takes a deep breath and drops the gown to the floor. She does a big cheesy grin as the camera takes a picture then frowns and shakes her head. She sets up the camera again and tries a variety of poses attempting to be sexy. She rips a cute kitten poster off the wall. She prints out one of the photos puts it in an envelope and writes Cal’s name on the envelope. She stops decorating the envelope. She opens the front door to find a bunch of lilies. Jessica picks up the bunch of flowers and reads the note. She shakes her head and stares out into the night. Cal is doing guerrilla gardening again. Cal puts the tools back in the she would. From in the house. Cal turns towards the house. He watches as Molly and Robbie hurry to the table. Emily traipses through the house to another room. She picks up a phone and dials. In the garden Cal takes his phone out. Cal eyes Emily nervously. Cal watches Emily who is not in the basement at all. Emily smiles. Cal's eyes are full of tenderness. Emily hangs up and looks down sadly. Cal hangs up still watching her from the garden. Emily heads back to the kids. The wheels of a trolley rotate on a shiny floor. Cal is in a DIY store with Robbie and Molly. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: She pivots to gaze at the mirror and loosens the laces on her hiking boots. She inhales sharply and tosses the boots to the ceiling. She makes a huge, goofy wink as the mirror sketches a portrait, then grins and nods her arm. She dismantles the mirror again and experiments with an assortment of stances, striving to be scholarly. She tears an amusing puppy calendar from the refrigerator. She copies one of the drawings, inserts it in a suitcase, and scribbles Ted’s alias on the suitcase. She pauses designing the suitcase. She unlocks the back window to discover a pile of marigolds. Samantha lifts the pile of leaves and skims the map. She nods her arm and peers into the morning. Ted is conducting shadow boxing again. Ted places the gadgets back in the attic. From inside the barn, Ted turns towards the barn. He observes as Grace and Danny jog to the sofa. Hannah ambles through the barn to another attic. She lifts a tablet and types. In the orchard, Ted removes his tablet. Ted examines Hannah anxiously. Ted observes Hannah, who is not in the attic at all. Hannah beams. Ted's gaze is filled with anxiety. Hannah puts down and looks up cheerfully. Ted puts down, still observing her from the orchard. Hannah goes back to the pets. The wheels of a skateboard slide on a gritty sidewalk. Ted is in a hardware shop with Danny and Grace. Ted picks up a metal ladder. Oliver is in a cheese store. Oliver turns to Linda. He tickles her elbow, then hugs her. They wander off. In Samantha's lounge, her uncle, Fiona, is sorting out dirty dishes. As she puts something on her dresser, she notices the suitcase. She pulls it out to spot Ted's alias written on it in small characters. She unzips the suitcase and fully extracts the drawing from underneath. She giggles, relieved. Hannah mans her bicycle along her dusty, urban alley and maneuvers into her garage. Danny is sitting in the back porch. His brow raised, Hannah glares at him. He sings. His brow raised, Hannah glares at him. Fiona climbs up the ladder in a state of anger. Charlie is lying on the carpet, playing video games. Charlie takes a gulp of lemonade. Fiona taps Charlie's knee from across the carpet and shows him the suitcase. Charlie gives Fiona a big laugh and turns away from the video games. Absentmindedly, he unzips the suitcase and scans up at the drawing. He unfreezes. There are multiple drawings inside. He examines them. His eyes widen. Samantha, who is standing on the roof nearby, notices the suitcase. Charlie chases her from the carpet through the wall.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Jessica sets up her camera, posing for photos and eventually sending one to Cal. Discovering lilies at her door, she thinks of Cal's mysterious gardening habits. Meanwhile, Cal watches Emily, feeling tenderness, but she appears saddened after their phone call. Emily then goes inside with the kids. Later, Cal shops for gardening supplies with Robbie and Molly, while Jacob and Hannah have a playful moment in a wine shop. At home, Jessica's mom, Claire, finds an envelope labeled with Cal's name in her daughter's room. Shocked at its contents, she gives it to Bernie, who is stunned by the photos inside. Jessica tries to retrieve the envelope from Bernie, who races her to the door.
